divs: sighting detailsi was driving home mid afternoon approximatly a half hour east of north bay ontario on hwy.#17. it was raining sporadically and weather was heavily overcast with fast moving low clouds. the light caught my eye from the far right of my fov. it was sillouetted against a background of trees on a hillside. as i focused my attention on the object it proceed to shoot across the sky from my farthest right,. to my farthest left so fast i could barely track it. i knew right away that i had seen a ufo because no aircraft we use can move so rapid from standstill. i remember feeling awestruck because although im not a sceptic. im a type of guy who wont believe something until i see with my own eyes. the clouds were very low {aprox. 500 ft} and the craft flew underneath the cloud cover which made it quite clear to see the shape. i pulled over on the highway in hopes to see the object but never seen it again. i noticed the car behind also slowed down and their eyes were fixed to the spot where i lost sight of the craft which i assumed they had also seen it as well. http:\\www.ufocasebook.com\vancouverislandcanada.jpg im attacting this link because when i seen this picture it reminded me almost identically of what i had seen that day.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in North Bay

Summary: silver reflective surface, point in the front,. larger in the back with a light at rear
